text: It's like all of my life everyone has always told me, 'You're a shoe, you're a shoe, you're a shoe, you're a shoe.' And then today I just stopped and I said, 'What if I don't want to be a shoe? What if I want to be a purse, you know? Or, a hat?'
speaker: Rachel Green
episode_title: The One Where Monica Gets A Roommate (The Pilot)

text: All right, kids, I gotta get to work. If I don't input those numbers... it doesn't make much of a difference.
speaker: Chandler Bing
episode_title: The One With The Thumb

text:
Rachel: Phoebe, do you have a plan?
Phoebe: I don't even have a 'pla'.
speaker: Phoebe Buffay
episode_title: The One With George Stephanopoulos

text:
Chandler: So... Saturday night, the big night. Date night. Saturday night, Sa-tur-day night!
Joey: No plans, huh?
Chandler: Not a one.
speaker: Chandler Bing
episode_title: The One With the East German Laundry Detergent

text:
Monica: Okay, do you see anybody you think could be me?
Teacher: People! Last time there were some empty yogurt containers lying around after class. Let's not have that happen again!
Rachel: She could be you.
speaker: Rachel Green
episode_title: The One With The Fake Monica

text: You're over me? When were you... under me?
speaker: Ross Geller
episode_title: The One Where Ross Finds Out

text: They're as different as night and... later that night.
speaker: Monica Geller
episode_title: The One With Russ

text:
Rachel: Go tell him he’s cute, what’s the worst that could happen?
Monica: He could hear me.
speaker: Monica Geller
episode_title: The One After The Superbowl

text: Look at me! I'm Chandler! Could I BE wearing any more clothes?
speaker: Joey Tribbiani
episode_title: The One Where No One's Ready

text:
Joey: Oh! Uh, sorry, did I get ya?
Chandler: NO, YOU DIDN'T GET ME!! IT'S AN ELECTRIC DRILL! YOU GET ME, YOU KILL ME!
speaker: Chandler Bing
episode_title: The One With Frank Jr.

text: He's her lobster.
speaker: Phoebe Buffay
episode_title: The One With The Flashback

text:
Joey: Hey, Ross, I got a science question: If the Homo sapiens were, in fact, HOMO sapiens...is that why they're extinct?
Ross: Joey, Homo sapiens are PEOPLE.
Joey: Hey, I'm not judgin'!
speaker: Joey Tribbiani
episode_title: The One With The Giant Poking Device

text: Cheater, cheater, compulsive eater!
speaker: Ross Geller
episode_title: The One With The Football

text:
Monica: What's 'pleh'?
Joey: That's 'help' spelled backwards, so that the helicopters can read it from the air.
speaker: Joey Tribbiani
episode_title: The One Without The Ski Trip

text: Hey, just so you know: it's NOT that common, it DOESN’T happen to every guy, and it IS a big deal!
speaker: Rachel Green
episode_title: The One With The Jellyfish

text: Over the line? You... you.. you're so far past the line that you can't even see the line! The line is a dot to you!
speaker: Joey Tribbiani
episode_title: The One Where Chandler Crosses The Line

text:
Rachel: You idiot!
Chandler: I’m sure you’re right, but why?
speaker: Rachel Green
episode_title: The One With The Girl From Poughkeepsie

text:
Rachel: Oh, oh, oh, he's a transpons... transponster!
Monica: That's not even a word!
speaker: Rachel Green
episode_title: The One With The Embryos

text: 15 Yemen Road, Yemen.
speaker: Janice Goralnik
episode_title: The One With All The Rugby

text: WE WERE ON A BREAK!
speaker: Ross Geller
episode_title: The One Without the Ski Trip

text:
Phoebe: Yeah, I definitely don't like the name Ross.
Ross: What a weird way to kick me when I'm down.
speaker: Phoebe Buffay
episode_title: The One With Rachel's New Dress

text:
Chandler: Oh, she's got you running errands, you know, picking up wedding dresses...Wah-pah!
Ross: What's wah-pah?
Chandler: You know, whipped. Wah-pah!
Joey: That's not whipped. Whipped is wh-tcssh!
speaker: Chandler Bing
episode_title: The One With All The Wedding Dresses

text: I'd like to toast Ross and Emily. Of course my big toast will be tomorrow at the wedding. So this is kind of my little toast, or Melba toast, if you will.
speaker: Chandler Bing
episode_title: The One With Ross's Wedding (2)

text: I will find a selfless good deed! I just gave birth to three children and I will not let them be raised in a world where Joey is right!
speaker: Phoebe Buffay
episode_title: The One Where Phoebe Hates PBS

text:
Chandler: Condoms?
Joey: We don't know how long we're gonna be stuck here. We might have to repopulate the world.
Chandler: And condoms are the way to do that?
speaker: Chandler Bing
episode_title: The One With The Kips

text: They're still not coming on, man! And the lotion and the powder have made a paste!
speaker: Ross Geller
episode_title: The One With All The Resolutions

text: But they don't know that we know they know we know!
speaker: Phoebe Buffay
episode_title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out

text: Pivot! PIVOT!
speaker: Ross Geller
episode_title: The One With The Cop

text: This is your third divorce! You love divorce so much you're probably gonna marry it! Then it won't work out and you're gonna have to divorce it, divorcing guy. I'm so drunk.
speaker: Phoebe Buffay
episode_title: The One After Vegas

text: I'm Monica. I can't get a boyfriend so I'll stumble across the hall and sleep with the first guy I find there.
speaker: Rachel Green
episode_title: The One On The Last Night

text:
Ross: Chandler. I sensed it was you.
Chandler: What?
Ross: 'Unagi.' I'm always aware.
Chandler: Are you aware that unagi is an eel?
speaker: Chandler Bing
episode_title: The One With Unagi

text: Come on, Ross. You’re a paleontologist. Dig a little deeper.
speaker: Phoebe Buffay
episode_title: The One With The Ring

text: Fine! Judge all you want, but: married a lesbian, left a man at the altar, fell in love with a gay ice dancer, threw a girl's wooden leg in a fire, LIVE IN A BOX!
speaker: Monica Geller
episode_title: The One With Rachel's Book

text: No! No! No! I'm not yelling at you, I'm just yelling near you. Oh God, Joey! Oh, I'm my father. Oh my God, this is horrible! I've been trying so hard not to be my mother, I did not see this coming.
speaker: Rachel Green
episode_title: The One With Phoebe's Cookies

text: I like this one. It seems to say, 'I love you, and that's why I have to kill you.'
speaker: Ross Geller
episode_title: The One With The Engagement Picture

text: If he doesn't like you, this is all a moo point. Yeah, it's like a cow's opinion. It just doesn't matter. It's moo.
speaker: Joey Tribbiani
episode_title: The One Where Chandler Doesn't Like Dogs

text: I'm the holiday armadillo!
speaker: Ross Geller
episode_title: The One With The Holiday Armadillo

text: Dearly beloved, I'm sorry I'm a little late.
speaker: Joey Tribbiani
episode_title: The One With Monica & Chandler's Wedding (2)

text: I grew up with Monica. If you didn't eat fast, you didn't eat!
speaker: Ross Geller
episode_title: The One Where Rachel Tells...

text: Clearly you don't want people to see this tape. Now, I don't want people to see it either. But you so badly don't want people to see it that it makes me want to see it. Do you see?
speaker: Rachel Green
episode_title: The One With The Video Tape

text: I'm not so good with the advice... Can I interest you in a sarcastic comment?
speaker: Chandler Bing
episode_title: The One With The Tea Leaves

text:
Phoebe: Okay, I wasn't rich like you guys, okay? I didn't eat gold and have a flying pony. I had a hard life! My mother was killed by a drug dealer.
Monica: Your mother killed herself!
Phoebe: She was a drug dealer!
speaker: Phoebe Buffay
episode_title: The One With The Mugging

text: Thanksgiving is over! The vein has spoken.
speaker: Monica Geller
episode_title: The One With The Late Thanksgiving

text: I can write slogans. I mean, how hard can it be? Right? 'Cheese - It's milk... that you chew.' 'Crackers - Because your cheese needs a buddy.' 'Grapes - Because who can get a watermelon in your mouth?'
speaker: Chandler Bing
episode_title: The One Where Rachel Goes Back to Work

text:
Ross: I love marriage.
Phoebe: Seriously? You? Divorce-o?
Ross: If you have to call me a name, I prefer, 'Ross, The Divorcer.' It's just cooler.
speaker: Ross Geller
episode_title: The One With The Boob Job

text:
Ross: I went to that tanning place your wife suggested.
Chandler: Was that place THE SUN?
speaker: Chandler Bing
episode_title: The One With Ross's Tan

text:
Joey: Oh. 'They're warm, nice people with big hearts.'
Chandler: And that became, 'They're humid, pre-possessing homo sapiens with full-sized aortic pumps?'
speaker: Chandler Bing

text: JOEY DOESN'T SHARE FOOD!

Joey: Jet aplee blooo.
